previous.excerpt:
Title pretty much sums it up. Never thought I’d get addicted to the stock
market... I’m constantly distracted and keep checking my phone for updates,
don’t listen to lectures (never really did anyway lol fuck zoom university smh),
and once the market closes, all I’m do is read the news about certain…

localize.title: 沉迷于投资
